issue.title: [Flight] Add application metadata field to DoPut
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4627](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4627). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As [proposed on the mailing list](https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/c550264cd60e000d77e10d9d7ac81ea8c49efc37ad447177fa8ee4ee@%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E), we should add a field for application-specific metadata in DoPut payloads and expose this in the APIs. This also requires changing the client-streaming call into a bidirectional streaming call.
